Unit.Name: Observed Individual Means
Unit.Description: Observed Individual Means: just the empirical means over the observed days.

Unit.Name: BetaBinomial Normal
Unit.Description: BetaBinomial distribution for frequency of exposure + (transformed) Normal distribution for amounts (de Boer et al. 2009).

Unit.Name: Logistic-Normal Normal
Unit.Description: Logistic-Normal distribution for frequency of exposure + (transformed) Normal distribution for amounts.

Unit.Name: Logistic-Normal Normal with correlation
Unit.Description: Logistic-Normal distribution for frequency of exposure + (transformed) Normal distribution for amounts. Both models are estimated taking into account the correlation between exposure frequency and amounts.

Unit.Name: Iowa State University Foods model
Unit.Description: Iowa State University Foods model: semiparametric distribution for frequency of exposure + (transformed) Normal distribution for amounts (de Boer et al. 2009, Dodd (1996)).
